Text: ...Hey Exec, I got a question for you about these MIL eps. What's the source for these? Are they DVD rips, or did someone have access to near-mint prints and a film chain?

They're from Hulu, Chinga.

If you're here in the USA, you can watch this show and Abbott & Costello for free there....but with commercials!

Both The Mothers-In-Law and The Abbott & Costello Show were released in full-series DVD box sets 3 years ago.
